programme.title: Turning 5 In 2025!
programme.desc: Can you believe these tracks are already 5 years old?! Happy birthday to these tracks which we loved in 2020!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep49
programme.desc: Small Change - When Puss feels powerless against the threat of the Bloodwolf, the crew asks Callista to help find the mysterious location of the Obelisk of Night

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep56
programme.desc: The Healing Tree - While riding back to Miradero, the girls get lost -- and Abigail's horse gets bitten by a snake! Can an old friend's skills help save the day?

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep57
programme.desc: The Mystery of the Golden Unicorn - After finding a majestic horse in the wild, Lucky and the girls set out to solve the mystery of where she came from -- and where she truly belongs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep24
programme.desc: Bigpaw, Big Problems / Captain Scooch and Scally-Tag - Tag, Scooch and Kit think they found the perfect story for their newspaper: Bigpaw is in Pawston! But when they find out that Frank and Beans were lying to the town, they seek to uncover the truth and reveal it to everyone. \ When Sam Whippet sets up a pirate-themed race for the Race Cadets, pirate-loving Scooch takes on the role of captain. Tag struggles to take orders as first mate while helping Scooch navigate maritime obstacles and avoid the fearsome pirates.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep10
programme.desc: Downpour - Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep11
programme.desc: The Tangled Web - Tom and DAngelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep10
programme.desc: Downpour - Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep11
programme.desc: The Tangled Web - Tom and DAngelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep8
programme.desc: Surf N Turf / Hardcase Returns - The snails' relaxing day at the beach is threatened when the sewer surfing roaches challenge them to a surfing contest. // Hardcase returns and threatens to take revenge on, so the crew becomes his bodyguards and takes the job a little too seriously.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8
programme.desc: Viva Mort - When Julien embarrasses Maurice, he tries to make up for his transgression, while Mort inadvertently joins an anti-King Julien group.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep8
programme.desc: Wrinkly Humans People / Piggy Piggy - Tip doesn't think her grandparents will approve of Oh so he disguises himself as a humans housekeeper/Sharzod adopts Pig and names him Juicy Booty.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep8
programme.desc: Biggest Fan/ Queen Isabella - Shelby, Peabody & Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show; Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders Of Berk Ep8
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction - When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep8
programme.desc: Magma Breather - Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and DAngelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep18
programme.desc: Mini Mayhem in Moscow - Whitebeard uses the Grow Key to make himself 40' tall. But the key breaks! So the Wanderers take the key to Wizard Fix-It in Moscow. While fixing the key, Fix-It accidentally makes Waldo, Wenda and herself two inches tall! So begins a Nutcracker-like mini-adventure in Moscow to retrieve the key from Odlulu and Fritz.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep8
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown / Shrinky Dust - Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep8
programme.desc: The Case Of The Golden Thing - The Knights have found a mysterious Golden Thing. But the Pirates insist it's their Golden Thing. Noddy tries to settle the argument by investigating: Who is the owner of the Golden Thing? He soon finds more and more Golden Things have been hidden all over Toyland.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep15
programme.desc: Where's My Puddle Gone? - Jess wants the puppies to come Puddle Jumping with him. There were lots of puddles the day before but when they get to the spot, the puddle's GONE! Jess goes searching - has someone taken it? Borrowed it? No, he works out that the water's gone back up in to the clouds.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep16
programme.desc: Why Has My Shadow Gone Away? - Jess has s new friend - Horace tells him it's his shadow. Jess is keen to introduce him to all his friends, but he keeps running away! Jess works out that the sun has to be shining for the shadow to come back and that all the friends have their Own shadows to play games with too.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep13
programme.desc: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit - Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep48
programme.desc: Teambuilding - The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep7
programme.desc: Uniconned - Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Villages babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep15
programme.desc: Best Friends Day / The White Whale - Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesnt love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep16
programme.desc: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo - When shark and pilot fish are separated its up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallops friend Theo finally comes clean on why hes always rushing off.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep15
programme.desc: Double Finked - Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep52
programme.desc: The Bloodwolf - When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep60
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Herd Is - With academy life on the horizon, the PALs work together to tame wild yearling Governor before they leave. But maybe he's not meant to be broken.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep61
programme.desc: Festival of Festivals - Lucky doesn't want her friends to miss their favorite Miradero traditions while they're away at school. So why not celebrate them all in one day?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep13
programme.desc: Model Behavior / Pillow Fight Club - Satin and Chenille put on a fashion show to impress the trendsetter of Troll VillagePoppy and Branch start a massive villagewide pillow battle to determine who gets the pillow of destiny.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep13
programme.desc: Sea Monsters / Puff Fruit - Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldnt believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep25
programme.desc: The Pawston Chewbilee / Dont Go, Cat. Go! - Based on PD Eastman's classic childrens book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scoochs easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tags high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, shes often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep21
programme.desc: The Great Paper Chase / Home Is Where Ken's Heart Is - When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep13
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 1 - While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to DAngelo and Alex.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep13
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep1
programme.desc: First Flight: Part 1 - Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13

programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep9
programme.desc: The Really Really Big Lie - When Julien concocts an elaborate lie, blaming a giant "mega-gecko" for ruining a young lemur's birthday party.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep9
programme.desc: Struck Through The Heart / Boov Up And Drive - Oh has an electric spark when he and Tip do the ultimate best friend handshake./Tip can't get Slushious back until she passes a Boovian Driver's Test.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep9
programme.desc: Peabody's Parents/ Galileo - Peabody's non-talking dog parents arrive for an unexpected visit; Galileo makes the world go dark when he crashes his spaceship and breaks the sun.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders Of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Zippleback Down - While searching for traps, Tuffnut, Barf and Belch get trapped themselves and a forest fire is approaching.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep19
programme.desc: The Swiss Mess - The Wanderers head to Switzerland to get some chocolate for Whitebeards chocolate fondue fountain. In Switzerland they find Odlulu using the Vacuum Key to steal all the country's chocolate so she can win The Colossal Festival of Chocolate.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep9
programme.desc: Bands On The Run / Vote For Casper - Bands on the Run Casper and Jimmy form a rock band to compete in the Deedstown Battle of the Bands. Vote for Casper Mantha is angling to win the office of Class Rep, but Kibosh fancies having a fellow ghost in power.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep9
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stolen Key - It's the day of the Toyland Singalong and Clockwork Mouse, an enthusiastic but awful singer, says everything must be perfect! But then her precious key goes missing and Noddy need to quickly investigate: Who stole Clockwork Mouse's key?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep9
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Noisy Present - Raa Raa has made his friend Topsy a wonderful present - a noisy set of chimes. But she doesn't want them. Who else in the jungle might like a very noisy set of wind chimes?

programme.desc: Bean Cake? / Elote - Chef and Olly promise Bonzo they'll make him a lookalike bean cake to celebrate Bean Day, but their lookalike practice cakes get in the way. Chef and Olly are planning a corn roast.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Holders Keepers / The Nickname King - William and Chucks compete for a prize. Chucks gives everyfishy a new nickname.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Hotel Shark - Hank goes on a swashbuckling adventure to help Captain Bubblebeard recover his signature beard.

programme.desc: Pups Save Jake's Cake / Pups Save a Wild Ride - Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show. But when it rolls out of control, the pups lead the chase!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build.

programme.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday - Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #6 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep30
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
